item.title: Work from home
item.description: Working from home in EU A picture of the diffusion of the working from home modality during and ‘after’ the pandemic in EU countries. A clear huge revolution in the work organisation, which can not be dismissed as a temporary measure to overcome the Covid-19 pandemic. A simple measure gives count of the phenomenon. The average percent of workers (employees) that usually work from home in the following years: 2019, 3.
